name: The Deep Forest
description:
Hi, my name is Ana and this is my first game I created in Unity3D for a school project.

It's just a small demo and I would like to know your opinion, and what I could improve.

Hope you guys like it :)

------- CONTROLS -------

"WASD"                                   --- Walk
"F"                                               --- Action Button
"SPACE"                                  --- Jump
"Mouse"                                  --- Look around
"Mouse Button1 or 2"    --- Rotate

Game hits:

- U need to light up all the candles before reaching the shrine.

- Follow the path and pay attention to the type of ground

- Some candles are hidden around the map but pretty close to you.
